entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 15 April 2023
